sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-tiptap :content="value" @onUpdate="onEditorUpdate" :extensions="extensions" />
</template>

<script>
import {
  // 需要的 extensions
  Doc,
  Text,
  Paragraph,
  Heading,
  Bold,
  Underline,
  Italic,
  Strike,
  ListItem,
  BulletList,
  OrderedList,
  HorizontalRule,
  Image,
  Link,
  Iframe,
  Table,
  TableHeader,
  TableCell,
  TableRow,
  Fullscreen,
  TextColor,
  TextHighlight,
  Preview,
  History
} from "element-tiptap";

export default {
  props: {
    value: {
      type: String,
      default: ""
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      extensions: [
        new Doc(),
        new Text(),
        new Paragraph(),
        new Heading({ level: 5, bubble: true }),
        new Bold({ bubble: true }),
        new Underline({ bubble: true }),
        new Italic({ bubble: true }),
        new Strike({ bubble: true }),
        new TextColor({ bubble: true }),
        new TextHighlight({ bubble: true }),
        new HorizontalRule(),
        new Link(),
        new ListItem(),
        new BulletList({ bubble: true }),
        new OrderedList({ bubble: true }),
        new Image(),
        new Iframe(),
        new Table({ resizable: true }),
        new TableHeader(),
        new TableCell(),
        new TableRow(),
        new Preview(),
        new Fullscreen(),
        new History({ bubble: true })
      ]
    };
  },

  methods: {
    onEditorUpdate(value) {
      this.$emit("input", value);
    }
  }
};
</script>
